::Autofire/Stratus::

"The great Hovotron, eh?" Autofire says, calmly approaching the group of D.E.D bots, not even glancing as Firestrike's body flew by, all weapons trailed on the enemies. "You don't seem so great from where I'm standing."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Stratus continues toward the ship, sending a transmission to Astroblast. "I'm about halfway to the ship, and I don't see anything yet. I think this thing's dead."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Dreadwind stood there surrounded by Decepticons, like himself, in 
> what could be the beginnings of Civil War 3 in the Transformers 
> history books.  Darkwing finally stood awakening from his dark 
> slumber, looking around and seeing Firestrike staring right back at 
> him.  Darkwing took a step back towards Dreadwind, as Firestrike 
> pulled out his sword.  
> 
> "AAAHH GO!"  Darkwing cried out as he jumped into the air 
> transforming into his jet mode, as DReadwind followed in suit.  The 
> two combined making a super jet, and blasting off at incredible 
> speeds.
> 
> Havotron and the rest of D.E.D flew forward as the screaming jet 
> whipped past them.  "What the slag" Havotron said.  "Dreadwing, 
> get over here" he yelled.
> 
> The jet pulled at fast turn coming back to Havotron, not saying a 
> word.  As the group arrived at where the Dark Avian used to be, 
> Havotron landed, followed by Dreadwind and Darkwing, now 
> seperated, Needlenose, and Scrapper, and hopefully the rest of the 
> D.E.D members.
> 
> When he landed he looked around, seeing a few select 
> Decepticons, but no base.  "What is this Deception, future 
> followers of the Great Havotron." he yelled out.  
> 
> Firestrike stepped forward.  "What do you mean, what Deception, 
> oh great Havotron" he said very mockingly.  
> 
> "Where is Megatron" Havotron replied pointing his unfiltered-energy 
> cannon at FireStrike.  Not recieving a reply fast enough a blast of 
> pure , dangerous energy, blasted out of the cannon nailing 
> FireStrike, sending him flying at the ground, hundred of meters 
> away, once again, awakeining the other side of FireStrike.  "Stupid 
> Megatron, once again he sends us out to get killed while he runs.  
> But I will win, and show the others that my leadership qualities are 
> better then the Megatron ancient styles"
